page.title: 08SERVICES CLAXBY/USSELBY
page.content: The only services that are static in the area is a small sub Post Office in Claxby village, providing only basic postal facilities. We have many services which come into the area. {MILK:}Delivered Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday, also local farmer delivers daily except Sunday {POST:}Collected twice daily, delivered each morning monday to saturday. {SCHOOL BUS:}Takes children to primary school at Holton-Le-Moor and comprehensive at Market Rasen. {FISH/MEAT:}Approx. once a week. {MOBILE SHOP:}Every Tuesday afternoon. {LIBRARY:}Once a fortnight. {NEWSPAPERS:}Grimsby Evening paper delivered Monday to Friday. {DUST CART:}Weekly.
